ChadGPT: Here is a simple Python script that uses the pyautogui library to simulate mouse movements and keyboard presses. This script will open the Run dialog box, type "cmd", and then press Enter.

```python
import pyautogui
import time

# Wait for 5 seconds to ensure the window is focused
time.sleep(5)

# Open Run dialog box
pyautogui.press('win')

# Type "cmd"
pyautogui.typewrite('cmd')

# Press Enter
pyautogui.press('enter')
```

This script will open the Command Prompt in Windows 11. Please note that this script requires the pyautogui library, which can be installed using pip:

```
pip install pyautogui
```

Also, this script will only work if the window is focused on the desktop. If the window is minimized or in another application, the script will not work as expected.
